Description.div:
An Enterprise can configure multiple allocation rule sets with different document types. If an AllocationRuleID is passed, the allocation rules associated with the AllocationRuleID is used to select Option.
The AllocationRuleID passed must be valid for both the Enterprise's rule set and document type of the order.
If set to N, resource pool capacity will be ignored during availability check. If not passed, assumed Y.

Indicates if inventory should to be checked.
Default: Y
Valid Values: Y Y or N
If Y , either the DistributionRuleId passed or the organization's default DistributionRuleId is used to obtain a distribution rule for supply and demand filtering for the availability calculations.
If N , either the DistributionRuleId passed or the organization's default DistributionRuleId is used to obtain a distribution rule for inventory availability. No supply or demand is read. Distribution drives inventory availability calculations.

Attribute.Name: ConsiderChangingShippingToDelivery
Attribute.Description:
Indicates that the API should inspect lines that have DeliveryMethod set to SHP in addition to DEL , and consider placing those lines on work orders if the corresponding catalog item has IsDeliveryAllowed set to M .
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Description.div:
The ConsiderSupplementalCapacity flag indicates that supplemental capacity should also be considered when computing the availability of the resource pools which can serve the service lines.
If ConsiderSupplementalCapacity flag is not passed as Y , then the value of the CanConsumeSupplementalCapacity attribute of the customer (if existed) in the order will be used.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

Attribute.Name: ConsolidateToExistingWorkOrder
Attribute.Description:
Indicates that consolidating lines on the order to already existing work orders should be considered. If this flag is passed as Y , consolidating to an existing work order if the item can be associated with a delivery service on the work order will be considered before creating a new work order to deliver that item.
The default value for this flag is N .

Description.div: The number of days specified in DelayWindow is counted from the day on which the API is run. If this attribute is not passed, then Allowed_Shipment_Delay_Days and the Service_Search_Window (for delivery sevice lines) specified by the allocation rules are used to determine the delay window.
If set to Y, minimum notification time will be ignored for product and services. If not passed, assumed N.
If set to Y, check will be made only for service lines. Constraints with product lines will be ignored. If not passed, assumed N.
If set to Y, check will be made only for products being included on the work order. If not passed, assumed N.

Element.Description: A list of all work orders associated with the order.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: The total number of work orders associated with the order.

Description.div: Description of appointment status.
Case for which the work order is processed.

Attribute.Name: CreatedOrModified
Attribute.Description:
Indicates that the work order was created or modified by this call to generateWorkOrder. Possible values:
Created - This work order was created by this call to generateWorkOrder.
Modified - This work order was modified by this call to generateWorkOrder.
N - This work order was not directly changed by this call to generateWorkOrder.

Description.div: For work orders where multiple appointments are not required, this field denotes the current appointment sequence.
Pallet for which the work order is processed.
Description of Pre-call status.
Description of Reason Code.
Indicates whether the work order can be released further or not.
This field denotes the highest service level across all service items included in the work order. For PS work orders only PS service items are considered. Applicable only for PS or DS work orders.
Description of Service Item.
Description of WorkOrder status.
The total value of the work order.
The quantity requested in the volume unit of measure.
The quantity requested in the weight unit of measure.
The volume unit of measure in which quantity needs to be requested.
The weight unit of measure in which quantity needs to be requested.

Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction
Description of item.
Short Description of item.

Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action =
DELETE
will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: AllocationDate
Attribute.Description: The date when this line will be allocated. This is calculated at order creation time, based on the node processing time. This field is not used from version 50 onwards. The ALLOCATION_LEAD_TIME field is used instead.

Attribute.Name: AllocationLeadTime
Attribute.Description: The number of days it will take any node to ship the item after a ship advice is sent. It is defaulted from the Rule Set Field Name (YFS_RULES.LEAD_TIME). The release process will this value, or the scheduled node's lead time (setup at ship node level), whichever is greater.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AvailableQtyForStopDelivery
Attribute.Description: The quantity available through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.

Description.div:
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasServiceLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.

Attribute.Name: IntentionalBackorder
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.2.1. Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: IsBundleParent
Attribute.Description:
Indicates if Order line is bundle parent line or not.
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: OverallStatus
Attribute.Description: A description of the order line's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.

Attribute.Name: RemainingQty
Attribute.Description: Remaining quantity.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonLongDesc
Attribute.Description: Long description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonShortDesc
Attribute.Description: Short description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnableQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity of item that could be returned from this line at its current status.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order line.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Description.div:
Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction

Attribute.Name: AllocationLeadTime

Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.

N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

The ConsiderCurrentSlot flag indicates that system should consider the available capacity of the current slots, which the current timestamp falls under.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
The quantity requested in the work order's volume unit of measure, which is specified in the VolumeUOM field of the work order
The quantity requested in the work order's weight unit of measure, which is specified in the WeightUOM field of the work order

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status of the order.

Description.div:
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

This table stores information about all the components required by the work order.
Components are not mandatory for work orders created for the KITTING service item group code.
Stores details of the inventory tag attributes for work order components that are tag tracked. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory.
Case for which the activity is performed.
Pallet for which the activity is performed.
This element will be returned only for non-history work orders. For history work orders no modifications allowed.

Attribute.Name: ModificationType
Attribute.Description: Modification Type

Attribute.Name: ThroughOverride
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate if the modification is to be done by overriding the status allowed.

Description.div: Indicates if this audit has been updated by current transaction.
Description of Reason Code.
Name of the transaction.

Attribute.Name: AuditType
Attribute.Description: Type of Audit

Attribute.Name: DataType
Attribute.Description: Data type Audited

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Attribute Audited

Attribute.Name: DataType
Attribute.Description: Data Type of the attribute Audited

Description.div: This element will be returned only for non-history work orders. For history work orders no modifications allowed.

Attribute.Name: ModificationType
Attribute.Description: Modification Type

Attribute.Name: ThroughOverride
Attribute.Description: Flag to indicate if the modification is to be done by overriding the status allowed.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of answer sets in the Order.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of answer sets in the Order.

Description.div: Stores details of the inventory tag attributes of the work order item that is tag tracked. Tag information is stored only if the Node tracks tag information in inventory.

Attribute.Name: StatusDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of hold type status.

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which created the hold type.

Attribute.Name: StatusDescription
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which changed the status of the hold type.

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which changed the status of the hold type.
